timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText: I went with of, since literal would imply to me that null's aren't handled.
replies.author: Sturmlilie

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		COMMENT Creates a {@link Text} instance from a nullable string.
          
          
            
            		COMMENT @return the {@link Text} instance created from {@code string}
          
          
            
            		COMMENT @param string a nullable string.
          
          
            
            		COMMENT Creates a literal text with the given string as content.
timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Do you describe interface methods based on their default behavior? If a subclass overrides this, the comment will be inaccurate.
replies.author: Sturmlilie

replies.bodyText:
Fyi this method is static. Procyon is known for displaying interface static as defaults.
Also side note (unrelated): this is client only
replies.author: liach
